UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the user, preferably in E.164 format.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

CarrierProfile.title: CarrierProfile
CarrierProfile.description: Represents a carrier's profile in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the carrier profile.

contactEmail.description: The contact email for the carrier.

phoneNumber.description: The contact phone number for the carrier.

averageRating.description: The carrier's average rating, from 0 to 5.

photoURL.description: URL of the carrier's profile picture.

vehicleCategory.description: The category of the primary vehicle.

bankDetails.description: The carrier's bank account details for payouts.

accountHolderName.description: Full name of the account holder.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the carrier profile was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the carrier profile was last updated.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the trip.

carrierId.description: ID of the carrier providing the trip.

carrierName.description: The name of the carrier (denormalized for quick display).

origin.description: The starting point of the trip.

destination.description: The final destination of the trip.

departureDate.description: The date and time of departure.

arrivalDate.description: The estimated date and time of arrival.

status.description: The current status of the trip.

cargoDetails.description: Details about the cargo being transported.

passengers.description: Number of passengers for the trip.

acceptedOfferId.description: The ID of the offer that the user has accepted.

bookingIds.description: A list of booking IDs associated with this trip (for ride-sharing).

price.description: Price per seat for a scheduled trip.

availableSeats.description: Number of available seats for a ride-sharing trip.

depositPercentage.description: The percentage of the total price required as a deposit.

vehicleType.description: The type of vehicle used for the trip.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the trip was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the trip was last updated.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Represents a booking made by a user for a specific trip.

userId.description: ID of the user who made the booking.

carrierId.description: ID of the carrier providing the trip (denormalized for rule validation).

passengersDetails.description: Details of each passenger in the booking.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the booking was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the booking was last updated.

Offer.title: Offer
Offer.description: Represents an offer made by a carrier for a specific trip request.

tripId.description: ID of the trip request this offer is for.

carrierId.description: ID of the carrier making the offer.

price.description: The price offered by the carrier for the trip.

status.description: The current status of the offer.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the offer was created.

vehicleModelYear.description: The model year of the vehicle.

availableSeats.description: The number of available seats in the vehicle.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: ID of the user who receives the notification.

message.description: The main content of the notification.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

link.description: A URL link to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

Rating.title: Rating
Rating.description: Represents a rating given by a user to a carrier for a trip.

userId.description: ID of the user who gave the rating.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the rating was created.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat channel between a user and a carrier for a specific trip.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat channel.

participants.description: An array of user IDs participating in the chat.

lastMessage.description: The content of the last message for display purposes.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last message.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

chatId.description: ID of the chat channel this message belongs to.

senderId.description: The user ID of the message sender.

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.
